profile:
Choosing a contractor is not something that should be taken lightly. 
Fortunately, Duralock Interlocking does not  take our work lightly, either.

When we take on a project, we treat your home as if it were our own; with the respect and effort it deserves. Our experienced professionals cut no corners, take no risks, and leave no stone unturned in crafting landscapes that are just as durable as they are beautiful. 

We’re serious about our work, and it shows. From the very first consultation to the very last stone, DuraLock is dedicated to providing excellence in landscaping solutions. Specializing in interlock stone installations, we are renown for our unparalleled work ethic and high quality installations of driveways, walkways, patios, steps and retaining walls. 

The Process:  

***

1) FREE estimate at your home by one of our Design Specialists
2) Custom design plan developed to maximize your space
3) Installation by trained & courteous professionals 
4) Increased value and curb envy of your home

No matter what your canvas looks like, DuraLock will ensure that the finished project is something that captures your vision, and the attention of your neighbours. Visit our website at or call us at 1-877-895-LOCK and watch your dreams take shape beneath your feet.
service_area: Mississauga, Milton, Oakville, Brampton, Burlington and the Greater Toronto Area
services: Interlocking Driveways, Walkways, Patios, Retaining Wall systems, Steps, Garden Walls.
payment_method: Visa, MasterCard, Cash & Certified Cheques. Financing also available.

profile: Siding, Stucco, Stone, Brick, Masonry and Fireplaces From design to installation, Stone Selex Design is a premier company with over 20 years of experience providing both residential and commercial customers with quality installation and a high level of customer satisfaction. Stone Selex Design is committed to providing full service installation for your exterior or interior stone veneer project. We also provide installation of stone veneer, stucco, brick, masonry and fireplace transformations. Design your own project with the NEW Stone Veneer Visualizer and have Stone Selex Design install it for you. The Visualizer gives you the ability to envision your project from the comfort of your computer screen. It has the power to transform a photo of your home into a professional digital rendering by adding siding, stucco and stone. Make your home the talk of the neighbourhood with stone and stucco, or stone and brick, or siding and brick, stone tile and wood siding. The possibilities of style and colour combinations are endless. A Stone Selex Design project manager will help you with each stage of your project from where to add stone, stucco, siding, brick and masonry and provide you with a quote for our installation services provided by our experienced masonry installers. If it’s a fireplace that you want to create or just simply add stone or masonry, Stone Selex Design and the visualizer can help you with this too. While you are in the planning stages of your fireplaces transformation the visualizer is a great tool to use. Look through photos for ideas and see what others are doing and then come to Stone Selex Design and ask us to install it for you. Visit us here: https://twitter.com/StoneSelex https://www.facebook.com/StoneSelexInc/

profile:
Trinity Marble Inc. is a custom stone surface company for the residential sector. Our services include slab inventory, custom templating, handcrafted fabrication and professional installation of all natural stone surfaces as well as many quartz surfaces. Our professional and dedicated sales staff, complemented by our experienced fabrication and installation personnel, are ready to deliver quality projects with industry-leading delivery times without sacrificing quality and service.
We specialize in the manufacturing of Kitchen Countertop, marble Vanities, Tub Surrounds, Fireplace Surround, Flooring, and many other custom stone applications. From the initial design phase and pricing to stone selection, our team of professionals will work with you to create breathtaking custom stone surfaces that will exceed your expectations as well as add value to your home.

profile:
LUNAC Flooring is a family owned and operated business in Ontario. We specialize in tile, stone, ceramic, laminate, and vinyl floor installation. In addition, we provide service for bath, shower, backsplash and fireplace tile/stone installation. 

The primary contractor, Marko, has been in the business since 2018, however it wasn't until 2020 that he pursued this venture on his own. 

LUNAC Flooring offers top of the industry techniques and materials for all installations regardless of project size and/or complexity. We work with you to determine pricing that fits your budget, and our consultations are free of charge.

Our primary focus is to establish and maintain relationships built on transparency and superior workmanship. Come home to quality!

If this sounds like something that you've been looking for, connect with us, and allow us to bring your vision to life!
services:
Tile, stone, ceramic, vinyl and laminate floor installation.
Backsplash, shower, bath and fireplace tile/stone installation.

profile:
Our offer is addressed to individual and institutional clients interested in comprehensive service and the highest quality of orders.
Meeting your expectations, saving your time, and thus money and intangible – but probably the most important aspects of life, which are peace and health – we carry out this seemingly simple task, which is the installation of tiles, slabs, stone, etc.
All this to achieve the intended end result, which is the completion of the project with the utmost care and only to the highest standards of services. Our many years of experience have led us to the highest precision and quality of our services.
services:
01.	Tiling services
We provide comprehensive services consisting in laying floor and wall tiles, porcelain, ceramic and glass for the use of private persons, entrepreneurs and developers.

02.	Natural
Stone Installation.
Natural stone is an ideal decoration for those who appreciate classic beauty and references to nature in interior design. What’s more, it is a very universal material that will work both in interiors – e.g. as a kitchen or living room decoration, but also outside – as a facade or fence covering.

03.	Complete Bathroom
Renovation
Bathroom finishing is a very important and at the same time the basic element of any major renovation or interior finishing. The way in which we arrange our bathroom depends basically on only one factor, namely – the size of the bathroom. If you need to connect a hydraulic or other installation – we will also take care of that for you!
project_minimum: No job is too small or big
